itunes:title: #26: Ask Shena #1: Staying Present in a Healthy Relationship, Managing Fears and Expectations of Motherhood
title: #26: Ask Shena #1: Staying Present in a Healthy Relationship, Managing Fears and Expectations of Motherhood
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: We are starting a new segment of the podcast called "Ask Shena" where listeners get a chance to have a mini-call with Shena.  This episode, being the first, talks about why we are adding this to the podcast, shares the call with listener "Allie",...
itunes:summary:
We are starting a new segment of the podcast called "Ask Shena" where listeners get a chance to have a mini-call with Shena. 

This episode, being the first, talks about why we are adding this to the podcast, shares the call with listener "Allie", and follows with final thoughts from Shena afterwards. 

MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE
